author: Nostalgia Nerd
description:
Back in 1999, everyone was convinced the Millennium Bug would destroy our computers at midnight; so I ran an actual Y2K diagnostic disc I found inside my Doom II box to see what really happens. From BIOS rollover tests to DOS panic dates, this little utility was supposed to save your entire PC from collapsing into 1980.

If you like retro tech; weird old utilities; and forgotten Y2K paranoia; you’ll enjoy this one.

#y2k #retrocomputing #doom2 #vintagepc #millenniumbug #windows98
title: Your Computer will Crash at Midnight
